== Highlight of video fragment ==

For annotating temporal media - such as videos and audios - fragments, we suggest to implement the recommendations collected in the [http://www.w3.org/2008/WebVideo/Fragments/WD-media-fragments-spec/ W3C Media Fragment specification] document. This allows the identification of a specific fragment of the target by defining a URI that usually embeds a specific time interval.
